name: paymentAuthorizationController(_:didAuthorizePayment:handler:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user authorized the payment request, and asks for a result.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationController, 
                         didAuthorizePayment payment: PKPayment, 
                                     handler completion: @escaping (PKPaymentAuthorizationResult) -> Void)
